What are people asking?
How long will it take to process my installment request?
Your request will be processed instantly and will be reflected on your next Credit Card statement.
How long do I have to repay the amount I convert to an installment plan?
You can choose to pay back over 12, 18, 24, 36 or 48 months.
What happens if I miss a monthly installment?
If you miss a monthly payment, your installment plan will automatically be foreclosed. The full outstanding balance will be due immediately including foreclosure fees, and regular finance charges will apply to the remaining amount.
Can I cancel my Installment Plan, and will I be charged?
Yes, you can cancel at any time. A foreclosure fee of 1% of the principal outstanding and 5% VAT, will apply. To cancel, call us on
600 54 0000
(UAE) or
+971 600 54 0000
internationally.

Are there any early settlement charges?
Yes, if you settle the Installment Plan early, a foreclosure fee of 1% of the principal outstanding plus 5% VAT, will apply.
Can I change the tenure on an existing installment plan?
No, but you can foreclose your plan by paying a foreclosure fee of 1% of the principal outstanding plus 5% VAT, then rebook the remaining balance into a new plan.
What is the interest rate for an installment plan?
A reducing monthly interest rate determined by Emirates NBD and charged on the principal amount, will apply. The interest rate is subject to change and is also based on Card usage and overall performance.
What happens to the Installment Plan if I prepay what I owe?

metadata.title: Credit Card Installment Plans - Easy Monthly Payments | Emirates NBD

content:
What happens to the Installment Plan if I prepay what I owe?
Even if you prepay the full amount, your plan will remain active until you request cancellation by calling us on
600 54 0000
(UAE) or
+971600540000
internationally. Once you call and cancel, a foreclosure fee of 1% of the principal outstanding and 5% VAT, will apply.
What happens if I close my Credit Card while I have an installment plan?
All active installment plans must be foreclosed before a Credit Card cancellation request can be processed. Foreclosure fees will apply.
